as.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwrite by asChild
as.description_zh: 此组件应呈现为的元素或组件。可以被 asChild 覆盖

asChild.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 更改作为子元素传递的默认渲染元素，合并其道具和行为。

forceMount.description: Used to force mounting when more control is needed. Useful when controlling animation with Vue.js animation libraries.
forceMount.description_zh: 用于在需要更多控制时强制安装。在使用 Vue.js 动画库控制动画时很有用。

trapFocus.description: When `true`, focus cannot escape the `Content` via keyboard, pointer, or a programmatic focus.
trapFocus.description_zh: 当 `true` 时，焦点无法通过键盘、指针或程序化焦点逃离 `Content`。

disableOutsidePointerEvents.description: When `true`, hover/focus/click interactions will be disabled on elements outside the `DismissableLayer`. Users will need to click twice on outside elements to interact with them: once to close the `DismissableLayer`, and again to trigger the element.
disableOutsidePointerEvents.description_zh: 当 `true` 时，悬停/聚焦/点击交互将在 `DismissableLayer` 之外的元素上被禁用。用户需要在外部元素上点击两次才能与它们交互：一次关闭 `DismissableLayer`，一次触发元素。

events.name: openAutoFocus
events.description: Event handler called when auto-focusing on open. Can be prevented.
events.description_zh: 在打开时自动聚焦时调用的事件处理程序。可以被阻止。

events.name: closeAutoFocus
events.description: Event handler called when auto-focusing on close. Can be prevented.
events.description_zh: 在关闭时自动聚焦时调用的事件处理程序。可以被阻止。

events.name: escapeKeyDown
events.description: Event handler called when the escape key is down. Can be prevented.
events.description_zh: 按下 escape 键时调用的事件处理程序。可以被阻止。

events.name: pointerDownOutside
events.description: Event handler called when a `pointerdown` event happens outside of the `DismissableLayer`. Can be prevented.
events.description_zh: 当 `DismissableLayer` 之外发生 `pointerdown` 事件时调用的事件处理程序。可以被阻止。

events.name: focusOutside
events.description: Event handler called when the focus moves outside of the `DismissableLayer`. Can be prevented.
events.description_zh: 当焦点移出 `DismissableLayer` 时调用的事件处理程序。可以被阻止。

events.name: interactOutside
events.description: Event handler called when an interaction happens outside the `DismissableLayer`. Specifically, when a `pointerdown` event happens outside or focus moves outside of it. Can be prevented.
events.description_zh: 当 `DismissableLayer` 之外发生交互时调用的事件处理程序。具体来说，当 `pointerdown` 事件发生在外部或焦点移出时。可以被阻止。
